title: 为什么我的函数文件不会被识别到
author: 咕噜and呼噜
txt_content:
本帖最后由 咕噜and呼噜 于 2020-8-6 23:03 编辑 

前面写着
execute as @s store result score @s emc_addp run data get storage minecraft:emc app_m
scoreboard players add @s emc_addp 1
execute as @s[scores={emc_addp=1..3}] run tag @s add emc_p
execute as @s[scores={emc_addp=1}] run tag @s add emc_p1
execute as @s[scores={emc_addp=2}] run tag @s add emc_p2
execute as @s[scores={emc_addp=3}] run tag @s add emc_p3复制代码还没什么问题
一加上
execute if @s[tag=emc_p] run function emc:emc_app_s
execute unless @s[tag=emc_p] run function emc:emc_app_f复制代码其中一句 游戏就识别不到这个文件了 删掉这2句又能识别到了 难不成函数有execute指令数量限制么......

我傻了 忘记if和unless后面加个entity了 谁来回复一下白嫖个爱心吧
